# ChangeLog

## 5.3.0
* Added new API with context support to fix service-client-ebay warning

## 5.2.0
* Fix: removed ebaykrakn from service config to fix error/warning generated by oauth-ebay, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3130

## 5.1.0
* Switch from short vip to long

## 5.0.0
* Upgraded LBS to v3 
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1654

## v4.0.1
* Fixed: Private IP check fails LBS service
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1640

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.1.7
* Upgraded `@ebay/service-client-ebay` to 1.x

## v0.1.6
* Removed unused dependencies

## v0.1.5
* Updated module dependencies

## v0.1.4
* Fixed: Enabled to include service visibility from Validate Internals, This would provide config, Markup/down capabilities

## v0.1.3
Fixed: Implemented `Service-Client-Ebay` for the service calls.
